responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[4BE4F0A16D08556ACD6685BF392E6719]", "34924F004E324811F71047BC1FCA482C", "Exactly the question I\'m grappling with. If they are somehow utilizing bound spirits, or creating these vessels, they wouldn\'t be mining common iron for repairs. They would need specific materials ? conduits, anchors, substances uniquely capable of holding or channeling such Essence.The Hammer\'s scouts confirm continued, intense activity in the Veinbreaker Mines. I need you to go there. Discover what unique ores or minerals they are truly after.")
